title: Futbol Americas: NWSL Abuse Scandal Fallout Continues
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez recap the UEFA Champions League and the performances of USMNT and Mexico players. Who stood out? Next, Derek Rae joins the show to preview Saturday's Der Klassiker between Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich. Then the guys preview MLS Decision Day and Liga MX play-in games for this weekend. Who will advance? Next, E60 Director/Producer Jennifer Karson-Strauss joins the show to discuss the documentary "Truth Be Told". The ESPN+ documentary chronicles the NWSL abuse scandal in depth.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Next, Derek Rae joins the show to preview Saturday's Der Klassiker between Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich. Then the guys preview MLS Decision Day and Liga MX play-in games for this weekend.
